Container.Name: PhoenixMiner
Container.Overview: Containerised version of PhoenixMiner. Helps turn your Unraid server into an Ethereum / cryptocurrency mining rig. Contains AMD drivers. Not affected by the AMD reset bug as it doesn't rely on vfio. Works with most Nvidia GPUs as well via Open Source drivers. Check the support link for detailed installation instructions.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please consider donating.

Config.Name: Wallet Address
Config.Description: Wallet address for receiving mined coin

Config.Name: Pool Password
Config.Description: Most pools just use 'x' as password, some pools treat this variable as a worker ID

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: Used for basic monitoring over http/https built into PhoenixMiner

Config.Name: Safety: Target Temperature
Config.Description: Target temperature for fans (only works if privileged mode is enabled)

Config.Name: Safety: Stop Temperature
Config.Description: PhoenixMiner will pause mining on a GPU if it hits this temperature (only works if privileged mode is enabled)

Config.Name: Safety: Resume Temperature
Config.Description: PhoenixMiner will resume mining on a GPU if it hits this temperature after being paused (only works if privileged mode is enabled)

Config.Name: GPU Device
Config.Description: GPU passthrough from host to container. This Isn't necessary if privileged mode is enabled, but won't hurt.
